column4: Ubuntu 6.10 is shutting down my PC at random intervals due to ACPI reporting a false temperature.  When I set "acpi=off" in my Grub menu.lst, my keyboard and mouse freezes on GDM.  I have had this problem for months and am ready to leave Ubuntu if it's really this unstable.
I read your previous message.  No one probably knows how to help.  I suggest trying the forums and mailing list if you haven't already
or no one knows the answer
